main event: The observer sighted a silvery object that sailed on a NW course, made a slight turn, and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 15 minutes, with the observer seeing two objects in total.
The first object was very bright, moved to the east, then turned south and disappeared.
The second object was seen about 15 minutes later, going west then turning south and disappearing.
The observer estimated the objects were at an altitude of around 2,000 feet.
No sound was reported from the objects.
